This package contains core entities for network management.
it.apice.sapere.node.networking.obsnotif.impl - package it.apice.sapere.node.networking.obsnotif.impl
This package contains the subsystem dedicated to the notification (and management) of remote observation of LSA-space events.
it.apice.sapere.node.networking.utils.impl - package it.apice.sapere.node.networking.utils.impl
This package contains some utility classes for networking handling.
